column1: #Text=I really think it ill-serves the body politic, to continue to make this election into a referendum on something it wasn't, namely the competence of women.
#Text=As other posters have noted, there have been many many women leaders throughout history.
#Text=Hillary Clinton was as hawkish as any man, when it came to Iraq, as pusillaminous as anyone else, when it came to standing up to Wall Street.

#Text=She could not successfully divorce herself from her very tainted history to represent the change that the clearly disenfranchised, or at least self-perceived disenfranchised, so desperately wanted.
